page.title: 20ATTITUDES
page.content:
When asked if more amenities would spoil or enhance the area,it was interesting to note, that the people who replied that it would spoil the area, were the older members of the community. Most of the people who replied that new amenities would improve the area,did add the rejoinder that it depended upon what the new amenities were, as to whether it would be an improvement or not. These findings were of such great interest we have offered them to the Parish Council for their perusal.
Latest News. Mr.George Moreton of School Lane, has finally brought Gas to Brereton. On the 8th November, gas was installed into his bungalow adjoining the village shop.
